metadata.Plot: After being exiled from Afghanistan, a former war journalist settles in a small town in Northern California and takes a job with a local newspaper. But when he attempts to cover local crime, he stumbles into local corruption that puts himself and others in danger.
metadata.Actors: Dominic Rains, Melissa Leo, James Franco
